shifter

cache

package cache

Visibility
  1. Public
  2. All

Type Members

  1. trait Cache extends AnyRef

  2. class CacheException extends RuntimeException

    Super-class for errors thrown when specific cache-store related errors occur.

  3. class CancelledException extends CacheException

    Thrown in case a cache store related operation is cancelled (like due to closed / broken connections)

  4. class KeyNotInCacheException extends CacheException

    Gets thrown in case a key is not found in the cache store on #apply().

  5. class TimeoutException extends CacheException

    Thrown in case a cache store related operation times out.

  6. class UnhandledStatusException extends CacheException

    Gets thrown in case the implementation is wrong and misshandled a status.

Value Members

  1. object Cache

  2. package inmemory

  3. package memcached

Ungrouped
